com.project42.iplanner.POIs

Class POIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project42.iplanner.POIs.POIController

  • public class POIController
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a POI controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      POIController()
      Creates an empty POI controller with no property initialized

    • Constructor Detail

      • POIController

        public POIController()
        Creates an empty POI controller with no property initialized

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static POIController getInstance(android.content.Context _mCtx)
        Obtains the POI controller singleton reference by passing it the current activity to be used in. If the _mCtx parameter is null, the current context of this class will be used instead.
        Parameters:
        _mCtx - The current activity for the group controller to be used in.
        Returns:
        The current instance of the POI controller singleton class

      • getAllUVI

        public java.util.List getAllUVI()
        The method to get UVI for the current time from GovTech's API. Retrieval of UVI at the current time instance.
        Returns:
        A list of UVIs.

      • getAllPSI

        public void getAllPSI()
        The method to get PSI for the current time from GovTech's PSI. Retrieval of PSI at the current time instance.

      • getData

        public void getData(java.lang.Double cuvi,
                    java.lang.Double cpsi,
                    java.lang.String poiid)
        The method to get all POIs, based on the UVI and PSI. Retrieval of POIs which match the UVI and PSI criteria.
        Parameters:
        cuvi - The UVI at current time instance.
        cpsi - The PSI at current time instance.
        poiid - The ID of the POI which matches the UVI and PSi values.

      • bookmarkData

        public void bookmarkData(java.lang.String userId,
                         java.lang.String poiId,
                         java.lang.String loc_name,
                         java.lang.String loc_address,
                         java.lang.String loc_desc)
        The method to add a POI into bookmarks. Bookmarking of a POI requires all the parameters to be non-empty.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user whom adds the bookmark.
        poiId - The ID of the POI that is selected to be bookmarked.
        loc_name - The name of the POI that is selected to be bookmarked.
        loc_address - The address of the POI that is selected to be bookmarked.
